text: Greatest Hits is a compilation album by American singer Selena. The songs used in the album were all in English. The only two other English songs Selena recorded that did not made it on the album were "Give Me One More Chance" and "Call Me". Both of those songs were on Selena y Los Dinos (1984). The album peaked at number 108 on the Billboard 200 chart in 2003. A special edition of the album was released. It had a DVD of all of Selena's music videos. == Track listing == #"My Love" (A.B. Quintanilla III) - 2:49 #"I Could Fall in Love" (Keith Thomas) - 4:42 #"Captive Heart" (Mark Goldenberg/Kit Hain) - 4:24 #"I'm Getting Used to You" (Diane Warren) - 4:03 #"God's Child (Baila Conmigo)" (Duet with David Byrne) - 4:16 #"Dreaming of You" (Franne Golde/Tom Snow) - 5:15 #"Missing My Baby" (A.B.
